file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: API to integrate with the Moneyfarm wealth management platform
  version: "0.8"
  title: Moneyfarm API
  contact:
    email: api-support@moneyfarm.com
servers:
  - description: API Auto Mocking
    url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/moneyfarm/api/0.6
  - description: Moneyfarm Test
    url: https://api-test.moneyfarm.com/v0
  - description: Moneyfarm Production
    url: https://api.moneyfarm.com/v0
tags:
  - name: account
  - name: app-configuration
    description: Collection of operations used for customizing the Moneyfarm app web and mobile user experience based on the kind of logged in user (including enabling/disabling certian features)
  - name: app-preferences
  - name: appointments
  - name: authorisations
  - name: backoffice
    description: Collection of operations used for administrative support of the customer-facing Public APIs.
                 These are available to a subset of users defined as Operators, which can act on behalf of one, or many, customers.
  - name: bank-account
  - name: beneficiaries
  - name: communication-preferences
  - name: direct-debit-mandate
  - name: documents
  - name: financial-details
  - name: instrument
    description: Collection of operations related to the supported instruments market data.
  - name: investment-order
  - name: investor-profile
  - name: login
  - name: management-fees
  - name: notifications
  - name: onboarding
  - name: payment
  - name: portfolio
  - name: portfolio-review
  - name: product
  - name: promotion
  - name: transfer
  - name: user
security:
  - bearerAuth: []
paths:
  /accounts:
    post:
      operationId: createAccount
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - create:customer:accounts
      tags:
        - account
      description: Create an account from product. Logged-in user and complete profile status are pre-requisites.
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/account-creation-parameters'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: The details of the created account.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/account'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
  /accounts/{id}:
    get:
      operationId: getAccountById
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - read:customer:accounts
      tags:
        - account
      description: |
        Get the details of an account.

        Note: The field `investmentType` is **deprecated**, please use `product` instead.
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The details of the specified account.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/account'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/not-found'
  /accounts/{id}/close:
    post:
      operationId: closeAccount
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - close:customer:accounts
      tags:
        - account
      description: Closes the account. Only accounts without open portfolios and no outstanding cash balance can be closed.
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Account identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
            example: "87261326-5399-44ca-9921-70daffd5dfe9"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Account has been closed successfully
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/account'
        '400':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/bad-request"
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/not-found'
  /accounts/{id}/portfolios:
    post:
      operationId: createPortfolioForAccount
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - write:customer:portfolios
      tags:
        - account
      description: |
        Create a portfolio for the given account. 

        You must call the `/accounts/{id}/recommendations` endpoint to obtain a valid recommendation. 
        With this recommendation, you can add a new portolio to your account specifying the `recommendationId` and one of the suitable `modelPortfolioId` listed in the recommendation.
        
        Once used, the `recommendationId` will not be reusable.
        
        The field `riskLevel` is **deprecated**. Use the `modelPortfolioId` field instead.
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/portfolio-creation-parameters'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: The `id` for the new portfolio.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  portfolioId:
                    type: string
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/not-found'
  /accounts/{id}/recommendations:
    post:
      operationId: createPortfolioRecommendationForAccount
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - create:customer:recommendations
      tags:
        - account
      description: Create a portfolio recommendation for an account.
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                timeHorizonYears:
                  type: integer
                  minimum: 1
                contributionOneOffAmount:
                  type: number
                contributionMonthlyAmount:
                  type: number
                goal:
                  type: string
                investmentStyle:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/investment-style'
                investmentAllocation:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/investment-allocation'
              required:
                - timeHorizonYears
                - contributionOneOffAmount
                - goal
      responses:
        '201':
          description: A list of portfolios by risk level and suitability status.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  recommendationId:
                    type: string
                    format: uuid
                  availablePortfolios:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/available-portfolio'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/not-found'
  /activities:
    get:
      operationId: listActivitiesForUser
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - read:customer:activities
      tags:
        - user
      description: Get activities for a user.
      parameters: 
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/page'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/page-size'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/sort'
        - name: type
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/activity-type'
        - name: from
          in: query
          description: The date from which the activities list should start, this is an inclusive date range boundary.
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: to
          in: query
          description: The date to which the activities list should end, this is an inclusive date range boundary.
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: accountId
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
        - name: portfolioId
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
              format: uuid
          style: form
          explode: false
        - name: metadata.type
          in: query
          description: > 
            The sub-type of the activity expressed with metadata field named type.
            This filter is allowed ***only if*** a value is provided for the parameter `type`.
            The only activity type that currently suports this filter is `cash-flow`.
          required: false
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/cash-flow-type'
          style: form
          explode: false
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A list of activities for the authenticated user.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/user-activities'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
  /app-configuration:
    get:
      operationId: getAppConfiguration
      security:
        - bearerAuth:
            - read:customer:app-configuration
      tags:
        - app-configuration
      summary: Retrieve the app configuration.
      description: Retrieve the Moneyfarm web/mobile app configuration for the logged in user. This API is intended for Moneyfarm usage only to retrieve readonly properties, to customize the experience of the Moneyfarm app based on the logged in user product distribution channel setup.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The readonly app configuration for the logged in user.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/app-configuration'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
  /app-preferences:
    get:
      operationId: getAppPreferences
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - read:customer:app-preferences
      tags:
        - app-preferences
      summary: Retrieve the app preferences.
      description: Retrieve the app preferences for the logged in user. If the user has no app preferences stored, the default preferences are returned.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The app preferences for the logged in user.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/app-preferences'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
    patch:
      operationId: changeAppPreferences
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - write:customer:app-preferences
      tags:
        - app-preferences
      summary: Change the app preferences for the logged in user.
      description: Change the app preferences for the logged in user. All the fields in the request object are optional, but at least one field needs to be provided.
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/app-preferences-request'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The app preferences for the logged in user.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/app-preferences'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
  /appointments:
    get:
      operationId: getAppointments
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - read:customer:appointments
      tags: 
        - appointments
      description: Get a user's booked appointments
      parameters:
        - name: category
          in: query
          description: The appointment category to filter by
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/appointment-category'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Booked appointments for the user
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  items:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/appointment'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
    post:
      operationId: createAppointment
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - create:customer:appointments
      tags:
        - appointments
      summary: Book an appointment for a user.
      description:
        Book an appointment for a user.
        Returns Bad Request if given slot is not available
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/appointment-request'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Appointment booked.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/appointment'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
  /appointments/{id}:
    parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: The appointment id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
          format: uuid
    delete:
      operationId: deleteAppointment
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - delete:customer:appointments
      tags:
        - appointments
      description: Cancel a booked appointment for a user
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Appointment deleted
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/not-found'
  /appointments/availability:
    get:
      operationId: getAvailableSlots
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - get-available-slots:customer:appointments
      tags:
        - appointments
      description: Get the available time slots for an appointment
      parameters:
        - name: date
          in: query
          description: The date we are looking for availability in
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
            example: "2021-05-21"
        - name: category
          in: query
          description: The appointment category
          required: true
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/appointment-category'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Retrieve available slots
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:
                  - slots
                properties:
                  slots:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: string
                      format: date-time
                      example: "2020-09-11T11:00:00Z"
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
  /appointments/categories:
    get:
      operationId: getAppointmentCategories
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - read:customer:appointment-categories
      tags:
        - appointments
      description: Get the available categories of appointments for a customer
      parameters:
        - name: category
          in: query
          description: Filter by category
          required: false
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/appointment-category'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Appointment categories available for a customer
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  items:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/appointment-category-details'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/not-found'                              
  /authorisations/third-party-applications:
    get:
      operationId: getThirdPartyApplications
      security:
        - bearerAuth:
          - read:customer:third-party-applications      
      tags:
        - authorisations
      description: Get user third party applications. Each application contains the name and the id.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The user third party applications list.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/third-party-applications'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'                
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/not-found'  
  /authorisations/third-party-applications/{clientId}:
    parameters:
      - name: clientId
        description: api client Id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          example: 0bb969ef-7cd7-4a3b-9f76-9a9d88075eff
    delete:
      operationId: revokeThirdPartyAccess
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - delete:customer:third-party-applications
      tags:
        - authorisations
      description: Revoke access to connected third party application
      parameters:
        - name: clientId
          description: api client Id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
            example: 0bb969ef-7cd7-4a3b-9f76-9a9d88075eff
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/not-found'
  /backoffice/generate-access-token:
    post:
      operationId: generateAccessToken
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - generate:operator:access-tokens
      tags:
        - backoffice
      description: Generates a JWT to be used to call Public API operations on behalf of the identified user.
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              oneOf:
                - $ref: "#/components/schemas/user-id"
                - $ref: "#/components/schemas/partner-user-id"
              example:
                userId: "975f0cce-a564-45da-81f3-3d9358864879"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Moneyfarm JWT access token
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/access-token-response'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/not-found'
  /backoffice/onboardings/eligibility-status:
    get:
      operationId: isEligibleForOnboarding
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - validate-eligibility-status:operator:onboardings
      tags:
        - backoffice
      description: Check if a prospect is eligible for the onboarding
      parameters:
        - name: taxIdentifier
          description: the tax identifier of the prospect
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "RSSMRA30A01H501I"
        - name: distributionChannel
          in: query
          description: the product distribution channel that the prospect want to be onboarded
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: default
        - name: email
          in: query
          description: the email address the prospect want to use to be onboarded
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: email
            example: imaprospect@example.com
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Is the prospect eligible for onboarding
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                properties:
                  isEligible:
                    type: boolean
                    description: true if the prospect is eligible to be onboarded, false otherwise
                    example: true
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
  /backoffice/user-import:
    put:
      description: Create or update a customer to migrate. This endpoint is designed
        for data collection only.
      operationId: saveCustomerImportData
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - save:operator:customer-imports
      tags:
        - backoffice
      responses:
        '201':
          description: The user data has been stored successfully
        '200':
          description: The user data has been updated and stored successfully
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/not-found'
  /bank-accounts:
    post:
      operationId: createBankAccount
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - create:customer:bank-accounts
      tags:
        - bank-account
      description: Create a bank account.
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                identifier:
                  oneOf:
                    - $ref: '#/components/schemas/iban'
                    - $ref: '#/components/schemas/sort-code-account-number'
                  example:
                    iban: "IT60X0542811101000000123456"
                name:
                  type: string
              required:
                - identifier
      responses:
        '201':
          description: The new bank account.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/bank-account'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
    get:
      operationId: listBankAccountsForUser
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - read:customer:bank-accounts
      tags:
        - bank-account
      description: Get bank accounts for a user. The bank account identifier will be returned obfuscated
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/page'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/page-size'
        - name: products
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
              format: slug
          style: form
          explode: false
        - name: status
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - pending
              - action-required
              - validated
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A list of bank accounts for the authenticated user. The identifier of each bank account will be obfuscated.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/bank-accounts'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
  /bank-accounts/{id}:
    parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
    patch:
      operationId: renameBankAccountById
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - write:customer:bank-accounts
      tags:
        - bank-account
      description:
        Change the friendly name of the bank account.
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - name
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                  example: "My new bank account"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The updated bank account
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/bank-account'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/not-found'
    delete:
      operationId: deleteBankAccountById
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - delete:customer:bank-accounts
      tags:
        - bank-account
      description:
        Delete the bank account identified by the given id.      
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/not-found'
  /beneficiaries:
    post:
      operationId: createBeneficiary
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - write:customer:beneficiaries
      summary: "Create a new beneficiary"
      description: "Create a new beneficiary for the user. A beneficiary is a person related to the user for a certain investment product. Examples are: pension beneficiaries, the ones that will receive the funds once the owner passes away or children whose parents start investing for them up until they are eligible to claim the funds for themselves"
      tags:
        - beneficiaries
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/beneficiary-creation'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: "The created beneficiary"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/beneficiary-response"
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
    get:
      operationId: listBeneficiaries
      security:
        - bearerAuth:
          - read:customer:beneficiaries
      summary: Get the beneficiaries list
      description: Get the list of all beneficiaries linked to the user
      tags:
        - beneficiaries
      responses:
        '200':
          description: List of beneficiaries linked to the user
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/beneficiary-list-response"
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'          
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
  /beneficiaries/{id}:
    get:
      operationId: getBeneficiary
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - read:customer:beneficiaries
      summary: Get a single beneficiary by its id
      tags:
        - beneficiaries
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A single beneficiary
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/beneficiary-response"
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised' 
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/not-found'
    patch:
      operationId: updateBeneficiary
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - write:customer:beneficiaries
      tags:
        - beneficiaries
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
      summary: Update the beneficiary information.
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/beneficiary-update'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The updated beneficiary.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/beneficiary-response'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':

  /direct-debit-mandates/{id}/sign:
    post:    
      operationId: signDirectDebitMandate
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - sign:customer:direct-debits
      tags:
      - direct-debit-mandate
      description: Sign a direct debit mandate.
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - signedAt
                - filename
                - format
                - proof                            
              properties:
                signedAt:
                  type: string
                  format: date-time
                filename:
                  type: string
                format:
                  type: string
                proof:
                  type: string
                  description: 
                    "Cryptographic proof that the mandate has been signed by the end user.
                    The proof is expected to be the hexadecimal representation of the SHA-1 hash of the concatenation of: 
                    user-id, direct-debit-mandate-id and shared secret interleaved with periods: <user-id>.<direct-debit-mandate-id>.<shared-secret>.
                    i.e. for user-id: 7d1605f4-8fda-403b-8708-1b0857b13169 direct-debit-mandate-id: 149c862a-df74-43a7-b330-4dea77384c91 and secret: \"a-simple-shared-secret\"
                    the expected value would be baee6fe0fa96854d3a589d31a5673cb00dc9272a."
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The created draft direct-debit-mandate.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/direct-debit-mandate'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/not-found'

  /management-fees:
    get:
      operationId: getManagementFees
      summary: Get the list of management fees.
      description: |
        Get the list of management fees.

        Fees are assigned on the combination of `product`, `distributionChannel`, `investmentStyle` and `allocationStrategy`.

        The amount is split into different `brackets` defined by `from` (inclusive) and the `to` (exclusive) values.

        Each bracket can be of `type` which define if the fee is absolute "fixed" or proportional "percentage" to the amount invested.

        If any coupon is applied to the current user a `discountedFee` or `freeAmount` will be returned in the response.
      tags:
        - management-fees
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - read:customer:fees
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The list of management fees.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:
                  - items
                properties:
                  items:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/management-fee'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'

  /onboardings:
    post:
      operationId: onboardNewUser
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - bulk-onboard-user:operator:onboardings
      tags:
        - onboarding
      description: |
        Create a new user, account and portfolio. 
        
        The specified `productId` will define the investment type of the account. A `productId` must always be specified for the request to be valid. This can be done by either using the root level `productId` field or by providing it in the `account` object. If both are present the request will be considered invalid and rejected. 
        
        Note: The root level `productId` field is **deprecated** and will not be supported in future versions of the API.

        In order to create a portfolio you need to call the `/recommendations` endpoint to obtain a valid recommendation. You can use the `recommendationId` and one of the suitable `modelPortfolioId` listed in the recommendation response.

        Once used, the `recommendationId` will not be reusable.
      parameters:
        - in: header
          name: Idempotency-Key
          schema: 
            type: string
            format: uuid
          required: false
          description: Idempotency-Key is used to safely retry requests without accidentally performing the same operation twice. When this api is called multiple times with the same (client-bound) Idempotency-Key and same exact request, this api will return the same response generated the first time that Idempotency-Key has been received. Each Idempotency-Key will expire in 24 hours after the first request. It is up to the client to guarantee the uniqueness of the idempotency key, reason for which we strongly suggest to use a V4 UUID.
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                user:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/bulk-onboarding-user'
                productId:
                  deprecated: true
                  type: string
                  example: gia-discretionary
                  description: This is deprecated. Please use the 'account' field instead
                account:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/account-creation-parameters'
                portfolio:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/portfolio-creation-parameters'
              required:
                - user
                - portfolio
      responses:
        '201':
          description: The status of the onboarding request.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/onboarding-status'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'            
  /payment-orders:
    post:
      operationId: createPaymentOrder
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - write:customer:payment-orders
      tags:
        - payment
      description: Create a payment order.
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - paymentMethod
                - frequency
                - amount
                - destination
              properties:
                paymentMethod:
                  required:
                    - type
                    - details
                  properties:
                    type:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/payment-method-type'
                    details:
                      oneOf:
                        - type: object
                          required:
                            - bankAccountId
                          properties:
                            bankAccountId:
                              type: string
                              format: uuid
                        - type: object
                          description: "PSD2"
                          required:
                            - bankAccountId
                            - callbackUrl
                          properties:
                            bankAccountId:
                              type: string
                              format: uuid
                            callbackUrl:
                              type: string
                              format: url
                        - type: object
                          required:
                            - directDebitMandateId
                          properties:

                              type: string
                              format: uuid

                amount:
                  type: number
                  format: double
                destination:
                  oneOf:
                    - $ref: '#/components/schemas/payment-destination-portfolio'
                    - $ref: '#/components/schemas/payment-destination-account'

        '201':

        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'

        - change-model:customer:portfolios
      tags:

      description: |
        Change the portfolio model given the provided recommendation

        You must call the `/portfolios/{id}/recommendations` endpoint to obtain a valid recommendation.

  /portfolios/{id}/disinvestment-requests:
    get:
      operationId: getPortfolioDisinvestmentRequests
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - read:customer:disinvestement-requests
      tags:
        - portfolio
      description: Returns the paginated list of all portfolio disinvestment requests ordered descendingly by the creation timestamp.
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Portfolio identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
            example: "87261326-5399-44ca-9921-70daffd5dfe9"
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/page'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/page-size'
        - name: status
          in: query
          description: The expected status of the disinvestment requests to be returned by this endpoint. This can be used i.e. to retrieve only the pending disinvestment requests for the given portfolio.
          required: false
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/disinvestment-request-status'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The details of the portfolio disinvestment requests
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/disinvestment-requests'
        '400':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/bad-request"
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/not-found'
    post:
      operationId: createPortfolioDisinvestmentRequest
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - create:customer:disinvestement-requests
      tags:
        - portfolio
      description: Creates a pending disinvestment request for the given portfolio which is either a liquidation (= disinvestment of all assets) or partial disinvestment for a given amount.
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Portfolio identifier
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
            example: "87261326-5399-44ca-9921-70daffd5dfe9"
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - isLiquidation
              properties:
                isLiquidation:
                  description: Boolean flag to indicate whether the request is for a portfolio liquidation.
                  example: false
                  type: boolean
                amount:
                  description: Decimal value of the requested partial disinvestment amount. It is required when 'isLiquidation' is set to false, but not allowed when 'isLiquidation' is true.
                  example: 1030.22
                  type: number
                reason:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/disinvestment-request-reason'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Disinvestment request has been cancelled successfully
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/disinvestment-request'
        '400':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/bad-request"
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/not-found'

        - name: id

                  format: slug
                distributionChannel:
                  description: "The distribution channel identifier"
                  type: string
                  format: slug
                  example: standard
                contributionOneOffAmount:
                  type: number
                contributionMonthlyAmount:
                  type: number
                timeHorizonYears:
                  type: integer
                  minimum: 1
                goal:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/investment-goal'
                investmentStyle:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/investment-style'
                investmentAllocation:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/investment-allocation'
              required:
                - age
                - productId
                - contributionOneOffAmount
                - timeHorizonYears
                - goal
      responses:
        '201':
          description: A list of portfolios by risk level and suitability status.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  recommendationId:
                    type: string
                    format: uuid
                  availablePortfolios:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/available-portfolio'    
        '400':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/bad-request"
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
  /simulations:
    get:
      operationId: getSimulation
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - write:customer:simulations
      tags:
        - portfolio
      summary: Get a simulated portfolio recommendation.
      description: |
        Allows partners to offer their customers the ability to interact with our suitability engine without making any kind of commitment. 
        This allows customers to experiment with the __Moneyfarm__ proposition before they part with any of their personal details or commit to creating a portfolio. 
        
        __Note:__ A response from the */simulation* endpoint cannot be used to create a portfolio.
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: riskProfileScore
          description: Decimal value between 0-1 that denotes the customer's appetite for risk. This value is produced by the partners risk profiling engine.
          schema:
            type: number
            minimum: 0
            maximum: 1
          required: true
        - in: query
          name: financialExperienceScore
          description: Decimal value between 0-1 that denotes the customer's experience with financial concepts and products (familiarity with ETFs, education, foreign exchange, etc.).
          schema:
            type: number
            minimum: 0
            maximum: 1
          required: true
        - in: query
          name: annualSavingsPercentage
          description: Decimal value used to denote the percentage of customer's yearly income that they are able to save.
          schema:
            type: number
            minimum: 0
            maximum: 1
          required: true
        - in: query
          name: totalAssets
          description: Decimal value used to denote the customer's total investable assets (i.e. excluding the value of their house).
          schema:
            type: number
          required: true
        - in: query
          name: annualIncome
          description: Decimal value used to denote the customers annual income.
          schema:
            type: number
          required: true
        - in: query
          name: incomeSource
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/income-source'
          required: true
        - in: query
          name: age
          description: Customer age.
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
        - in: query
          name: productId
          schema:
            type: string
            format: slug
          required: true
        - in: query
          name: distributionChannel
          description: The distribution channel identifier
          schema:
            type: string
            format: slug
            example: standard
          required: false
        - in: query
          name: contributionOneOffAmount
          schema:
            type: number
          required: true
        - in: query
          name: contributionMonthlyAmount
          schema:
            type: number
          required: false
        - in: query
          name: timeHorizonYears
          description: Number of years that the customer plans to invest in their portfolio for. Used to determine the time horizon (short, medium, long) for the portfolio.
          schema:
            type: number
          required: true
        - in: query
          name: goal
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/investment-goal'
          required: true
        - in: query
          name: investmentStyle
          description: The investment style for the portfolio. It is an optional parameter that defaults to classic when missing.
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/investment-style'   
          required: false
        - in: query
          name: investmentAllocation
          description: The investment allocation for the portfolio. It is an optional parameter that defaults to managed when missing.
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/investment-allocation'
          required: false
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A list of portfolios by risk level and suitability status.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  availablePortfolios:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/available-portfolio'
        '400':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/bad-request"
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'

    put:
      operationId: updateKycStatus
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - write:customer:kyc-statuses
      tags:
        - user
      summary: Update the KYC identification flow status
      description: To update the KYC identification flow status, used from FE to update the status when one of the identification step is done. In this way we can leverage on this to check what is the next step for the user.
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/kyc-status-request'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Status of the successfully updated KYC identification flow.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/kyc-status-response'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/not-found'
  /user/video-call/sdk-token:
    post:
      operationId: createVideocallSdkToken
      security:
        - bearerAuth:
            - create:customer:video-call-sdk-token
      tags:
        - user
      summary: To obtain a sdk-token to start videocalls
      description:
        To use in order to obtain a sdk-token to start videocalls through
        Bandyer, the token will be used to inizialize the SDK in order to be
        able to call the external Vendor
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/video-call-sdk-token'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
  /users:
    post:
      operationId: createUser
      security:
      - bearerAuth:
        - create:customer:users
      tags:
        - user
      description: Create a new user.
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/user-creation-request'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: The created user.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/created-user'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/bad-request'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/unauthorised'
components:
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
  responses:
    bad-request:
      description: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/error'
          example: 
            type: "https://api.moneyfarm.com/errors/bad-request"
            title: "The request is malformed"
            detail: "Object is missing required member 'xxxxxx'"
    conflict:
      description: Requested action can't be performed due to conflicting state of the underlying resource.
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/error'
          example:
            type: "https://api.moneyfarm.com/errors/invalid-user-status"
            title: "The requested operation is not allowed in the user's current status"
    not-acceptable:
      description: Cannot produce a response matching the list of acceptable values defined in the request's proactive content negotiation headers.
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/error'
          example: 
            type: "https://api.moneyfarm.com/errors/not-acceptable"
            title: "The requested language is not valid."
            detail: "Valid options are 'en-GB', 'it-IT'"
    not-found:
      description: The specified resource was not found.
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/error'
          example: 
            type: "https://api.moneyfarm.com/errors/not-found"
            title: "The requested resource cannot be found."
    unauthorised:
      description: Authorisation information is missing or invalid.
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/error'
          example: 
            type: "https://api.moneyfarm.com/errors/invalid-credentials"
            title: "The requester credentials are invalid."
  parameters:
    document-type:
      in: query
      name: type
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
      description: The type of the document
    page:
      in: query
      name: page
      required: false
      schema:
        type: integer
      description: Page number 0-index
    page-size:
      in: query
      name: pageSize
      required: false
      schema:
        type: integer
      description: The number of items per page
    sort:
      in: query
      name: sort
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
      description: >
        Sort order:
          * `field:asc` - Ascending field, from A to Z
          * `field:desc` - Descending field, from Z to A
  schemas:
    accepted-recommendation:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        timeHorizonYears:
          type: integer
          description: The time horizon in years selected to obtain the recommendation
        investmentStyle:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/investment-style'          
        investmentAllocation:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/investment-allocation'
        riskLevel:
          type: integer
          description: The risk level of the model portfolio selected when the recommendation has been accepted
        modelPortfolioId:
          type: string
          format: slug
          description: The chosen portfolio model
        suitabilityStatus:                            
          description: The suitability status of the model portfolio selected when the recommendation has been accepted
          allOf:
            - $ref: '#/components/schemas/suitability-status'      
    access-token-response:
      type: object
      properties:
        accessToken:
          type: string
          description: JWT token, base64 encoded
        expiresIn:
          type: number
          description: duration of time the token is valid for (in seconds)
        tokenType:
          type: string
          description: type of token returned. Should always be Bearer
      example:
        accessToken: "eyJraWQiOiJwcml2YXRlLWtleSIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCIsImFsZyI6IlJTMjU2In0..lys-jMvvT_AIs7zKQzCB-6jDvWSxz7QvINiqdSIEBkPUBPhRWaxRAr2PEL1qb_LoD86-D3vJnWnUUXO23R5XDlv9wKoNIE7whA72gASQlQ3gCjXR1Rqq8k2D3D8jA4bi3n5HIgpSLmDM7RaZ2EvCBePMUWzD89pFkHjbGxliJcJZQ3COdf3AS5m0dFG8VurMsK87AvHEJ_yyJCjasf79yPPr8C-z9U0h6Q__3B8kVlhPlJeDashyCANRlkiONQFakTmSUYXfzERoP1k4DxFaDOdbig7ZURVZEyH4PFBftZggexmeWwyuwGFc0gV7a3y5pNVLCZJJ4f3pvNiHxNxkkg"
        expiresIn: 3600
        tokenType: "Bearer"
    account:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          example: "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6"

    disinvestment-request:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - status
        - isLiquidation
        - createdAt
        - updatedAt
      properties:
        id:
          description: UUID representing the unique identifier of the given disinvestment request
          example: "547eca5e-18d3-4a2c-968e-2966820078fd"
          type: string
          format: uuid
        status:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/disinvestment-request-status'
        isLiquidation:
          description: Boolean flag to indicate whether the request is for a portfolio liquidation, which means disinvestment of all available assets and funds from a portfolio.
          example: false
          type: boolean
        amount:
          description: Decimal value indicating the requested partial disinvestment amount, not present when liquidation is requested.
          example: 1030.22
          type: number
        reason:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/disinvestment-request-reason'
        createdAt:
          description: Date and time when the given disinvestment has been requested.
          example: "2020-11-12T15:09:26.145Z"
          type: string
          format: date-time
        updatedAt:
          description: Date and time when the given disinvestment has been last processed.
          example: "2020-11-13T17:32:00.000Z"
          type: string
          format: date-time
    disinvestment-request-reason:
      description: Enumerated string representing the reason for this request.
      type: string
      format: slug
      enum:
        - market-conditions
        - property-or-large-expense
        - hold-cash-in-portfolio
        - achieved-goal
        - not-value-for-money
        - performance
        - move-to-another-manager
        - change-portfolio
    disinvestment-request-status:
      description: Enumerated string representing the status of the given disinvestment request. The request can be either pending (it has not been yet processed), completed (it was processed and portfolio activities now return a resulting disinvestment cashflow) or cancelled.
      type: string
      format: slug
      enum:
        - pending
        - completed
        - cancelled

        - distributionChannel
        - investmentStyle
        - allocationStrategy
        - brackets
      properties:
        product:
          type: string
          format: slug
          description: Type of product at which fee is applied (e.g. "pip-discretionary")
          example: "pip-discretionary"
        distributionChannel:
          type: string
          format: slug
          description: Type of distribution channel at which fee is applied (e.g. "default")
          example: "default"
        investmentStyle:
          type: string
          format: slug
          description: Type of investment style at which fee is applied (e.g. "esg")
          example: "esg"
        allocationStrategy:
          type: string
          format: slug
          description: Type of allocation strategy at which fee is applied (e.g. "managed")
          example: "managed"
        freeAmount:
          type: number
          format: slug
          description: Optional amount where fees are not applied.
          example: 10000
        brackets:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/pricing-bracket'
    model-portfolio:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: slug
          example: "moneyfarm-it-r6-c2"
        riskLevel:
          type: integer
          minimum: 1
          maximum: 7
          description: Value between 1-7 that denotes the risk of the portfolio, where 7 is the highest risk.
          example: 5
        complexityLevel:
          type: integer
          description: Value between 1-2 that denotes the complexity of the portfolio, where 2 is the highest complexity.
          minimum: 1
          maximum: 2
          example: 1
        investmentStyle:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/investment-style'        
        assetClasses:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/portfolio-asset-class'
        instruments:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/instrument'
        expectedPerformance:
          type: object
          properties:
            mean:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/expected-performance-time-series'
            perc0025:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/expected-performance-time-series'
            perc0275:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/expected-performance-time-series'
            perc0725:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/expected-performance-time-series'
            perc0975:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/expected-performance-time-series'
        historicalPerformance:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              date:
                type: string
                format: date
              performance:
                type: number
          example:
            - date: "2020-06-20"
              performance: 152.2017
            - date: "2020-06-21"
              performance: 152.2017

    transfer-details:
      type: object
      description: >
        Explains how much of the account should be transferred.
        An ISA or JISA transfer can either be a full or partial.
        A Full transfer do not require other information. A partial transfer
        requires specifying how much of the current year contribution should be transferred (total or none)
        and how much of the previous years contributions should be transferred (total, none or partially providing the amount)
      required:
        - type
      properties:        
        type:
          type: string
          enum:
            - full
            - partial
        partialTransferDetails:
          type: object
          required:
            - currentYearContributionToTransfer
            - previousYearContributionToTransfer
          properties:
            currentYearContributionToTransfer:
              type: string
              enum:
                - total
                - none
            previousYearContributionToTransfer:
              type: object
              required:
                - type
              properties:
                type:
                  type: string
                  enum: 
                    - total
                    - partial
                    - none
                amount:
                  type: number
                  example: 2100.12
